wikipedia_page.main: George Jackson Meek (5 February 1934 – 16 March 2018) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger. Active in both Scotland and England, Meek made nearly 400 league appearances in a career which lasted from 1951 to 1965, scoring nearly 50 goals.

response: * March 2018: George Meek, 84, Leeds United, Leicester City and Walsall winger.
**George Meek, 84, Scottish footballer (Leeds United, Walsall). (death announced on this date)
*George Meek, 84, Scottish footballer (Leeds United, Walsall).Former Leeds United winger George Meek dies aged 84
